name: USynesthesiaSpectrumAnalyzer
doc:
USynesthesiaSpectrumAnalysisAnalyzer

USynesthesiaSpectrumAnalysisAnalyzer calculates the current amplitude of an
audio bus in real-time.

Settings: The settings for the SynesthesiaSpectrumAnalysis audio analyzer.
OnSpectrumResults: Delegate to receive all Spectrum results, per-channel, since last delegate call. If bDownmixToMono setting is true, results will be in channel index 0.
OnLatestSpectrumResults: Delegate to receive the latest per-channel Spectrum results. If bDownmixToMono setting is true, results will be in channel index 0.
